overview: Guo Wan Die is a kitchen fairy who dreams of finding her one true love. To do so, she travels to the mortal world, where she meets Jiang Cong - an aspiring cook and internet streaming star known for his good looks. However, fairies who go to the mortal world face one huge consequence, resulting in the loss of their powers and becoming human. Is Jiang Cong the one true love Wan Die will be risking everything for?
title: My Girlfriend Is a Fairy
